title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Chicago, Illinois
content:
Photo submitted by Maleek Toran from their new bike day at Milton Lee Olive Park on the Lakefront Trail in Chicago, IL. We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here. […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Chicago, Illinois appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
